message.content:
San Francisco is known for its numerous tourist attractions that draw visitors from all over the world. One of the most popular destinations is Fisherman's Wharf, located on the northern waterfront. It offers a vibrant atmosphere with its seafood restaurants, souvenir shops, and street performers. Visitors can also take a boat tour to Alcatraz Island, the infamous former prison.
